arts.ttl: Barça's Kika Nazareth (ankle) to miss 4 months
arts.sum: Barcelona forward Kika Nazareth has been ruled out for the season and is also set to miss the European Championships with Portugal this summer with an ankle injury.

arts.ttl: Ewa Pajor: ‘Sometimes I’m at home and it’s like: wow I play for Barcelona’
arts.sum: In an exclusive interview the Poland striker discusses facing former club Wolfsburg in the Champions League quarter-finals and wanting to improve every day There is a sense of familiarity to this week’s Women’s Champions League quarter-final between Barcelona and Wolfsburg, but with one decisive change. The two met in the 2023 final in Eindhoven with Ewa Pajor scoring for Wolfsburg after three minutes. This time, though, she will line up for the Blaugrana. Barcelona swooped to sign the Poland international last summer after nine seasons, 196 matches and 136 goals in Germany. And it is fair to say the goals have not dried up since the switch to Spain, where the striker has already won one trophy and scored 34 goals in 32 matches in all competitions. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Preview: Wolfsburg Women vs. Barcelona Women - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Women's Champions League clash between Wolfsburg Women and Barcelona Women, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
